Certificate.description: The Certificate schema describes a certificate that proves the identify of a component, account, or service.
Certificate.longDescription: This resource shall represent a certificate for a Redfish implementation.

enumDescriptions.PKCS7: A Privacy Enhanced Mail (PEM)-encoded PKCS7 certificate.

enumLongDescriptions.PEM: The format of the certificate shall contain a Privacy Enhanced Mail (PEM)-encoded string, containing RFC5280-defined structures.
enumLongDescriptions.PKCS7: The format of the certificate shall contain a Privacy Enhanced Mail (PEM)-encoded string, containing RFC5280- and RFC2315-defined structures.  The service can discard additional certificates or other data in the structure.

KeyUsage.description: The usages of a key contained within a certificate.

enumDescriptions.CRLSigning: Verifies signatures on certificate revocation lists (CRLs).
enumDescriptions.DataEncipherment: Directly enciphers raw user data without an intermediate symmetric cipher.
enumDescriptions.DecipherOnly: Deciphers data while performing a key agreement.
enumDescriptions.DigitalSignature: Verifies digital signatures, other than signatures on certificates and CRLs.
enumDescriptions.EncipherOnly: Enciphers data while performing a key agreement.
enumDescriptions.KeyCertSign: Verifies signatures on public key certificates.
enumDescriptions.NonRepudiation: Verifies digital signatures, other than signatures on certificates and CRLs, and provides a non-repudiation service that protects against the signing entity falsely denying some action.
enumDescriptions.Timestamping: Binds the hash of an object to a time.

KeyUsage.longDescription: This type shall describe the usages of a key within a certificate, as specified by the 'Key Usage' and 'Extended Key Usage' definitions in RFC5280.
